updates.summary: Audio behavior with PIP

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN a user is playing a Game and the game
AND the user puts that game into PiP

steps.action: N/A: No WHEN/IF statement in description
steps.result: THEN any autoplaying video on the home surface should be muted (ex. Live mode play

updates.summary: POTG - notification automatically added for followed team

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN a user is going through Onboarding
AND the user has selected a followed team

steps.action: IF they get to the notification page and opt-into Game notifications for their followed team
steps.result: THEN POTG will be added as part of the default Game package and be defaulted to on

updates.summary: POTG -  notification automatically added for favorite team

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN a user is going through Onboarding
AND the user has selected a favorite team

steps.action: IF they get to the notification page and opt-into Game notifications for their favorite team
steps.result: THEN POTG will be added as part of the default Game package and be defaulted to on

updates.summary: Scores: Default Day - Users East of EST

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a use of the MLB App

steps.action:
WHEN the device local time is set between 12:01AM -> 5:59 AM CET
AND the MLB App is restarted
steps.result: THEN  the Scores tab should show the previous day’s games

updates.summary: Scores: Default Day - Users West of EST

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a user of the MLB app

steps.action:
WHEN the device local time is set between 9:01PM - 11:59PM PST
AND the MLB App is restarted
steps.result: THEN the Scores tab should show the current day’s games

updates.summary: Filed Pass - Pass both players and teams for changes to both

preconditions.definition: GIVEN that I have followed new teams and players

steps.action: WHEN the app sends a post request to update my settings
steps.result: THEN both teams and players should be passed

updates.summary: Field Pass - Only pass teams for changes to followed teams

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN that I have followed new teams
AND I have not followed new players

steps.action: WHEN the app sends a post request to update my settings
steps.result: THEN only teams should be passed

updates.summary: Field Pass - Only pass players for changes to followed players

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN that I have followed new players
AND I have not followed new teams

steps.action: WHEN the app sends a post request to update my settings
steps.result: THEN only players should be passed

updates.summary: Headline Stack - Story and Video Icons

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a video or tap story in the headline stack

steps.action: WHEN the module is loaded
steps.result:
THEN a Video or Story icon will display under the headline text
AND the  text part of the icon (Story, Video) will be localized (Cronica, Video in Spanish)

updates.summary: Headline Stack - Layout

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a user on the Home Surface

steps.action: WHEN the Headline Stack section is viewed
steps.result:
THEN the module displays with a header if set
AND it will be a vertically scrollable list
AND the articles display with team, league, player or WBC spot per display rules if spot are not hidden
AND the articles display with headline

updates.summary: Headline Stack - Header Text

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a Headline Stack module

steps.action: WHEN the headerText is filled in Contentful
steps.result:
THEN that value appears atop the headline stack
AND the value should be localized to support Spanish

updates.summary: Headline Stack - tapping content - Analytics

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a user on the Headline Stack

steps.action: WHEN a content item is tapped (Article, Video, VSM, Short)
steps.result:
THEN the following tracking dimensions will be sent: (values will differ):
AND if it's an article
AND if it's VSM content
AND if it's Short content
AND if it's a video

updates.summary: Headline Stack - Spots - Minor League Baseball

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a content piece (Article, Video, VSM Content)

steps.action:
WHEN the content is tagged with minor-league-baseball
AND is not tagged with a single team or world baseball classic tag
steps.result: THEN render the MiLB spot next to the headline

updates.summary: Headline Stack - Spots WBC logo

preconditions.definition: GIVEN an article in the Headline Stack

steps.action: WHEN the article contains the tag world-baseball-classic
steps.result:
THEN the associated spot should be the WBC spot
AND it will take priority over showing a team or player spot

updates.summary: Main Page - Scroll Depth Analytics

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a user on the Home tab

steps.action: WHEN the user exits the MLB App or leaves the surface
steps.result:
THEN fire a trackAction with the maximum depth achieved by the user in that session
AND it should send the path to Home and append "Max Scroll Depth" as the name
AND “points” should be sent in the context data with a value that reflects the depth

updates.summary: Jewel - Duplicate Live Activities are not triggered with Push to Start and Manual Flow

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has auto-track enabled for their favorite team
AND the user has a device with OS >= 17.2
AND the user is on the scoreboard

steps.action:
WHEN the user’s favorite team or All-Star game is playing
AND the user has manually triggered a Live Activity for their favorite team or All-Star game
WHEN the game enters Warmup state
steps.result: THEN they will NOT receive a duplicate Live Activity via Push to Start

updates.summary: Jewel - Default Track Button State for Users with OS < 17.2 (Not Push to Start eligible, legacy Live Activity Autotrack eligible)

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has auto-track enabled
AND the user has a device with OS < 17.2
AND the user is on the scoreboard

steps.action: WHEN the user’s favorite team or All-Star game is playing
steps.result:
THEN the user is presented the track button for live activities beginning 4.5 hours before game start time
AND the track button is defaulted to selected

updates.summary: Jewel - Default Track Button State for Users with OS >= 17.2 (Push to Start Eligible)

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has auto-track enabled for their favorite team
AND the user has a device with OS >= 17.2
AND the user is on the scoreboard

steps.action: WHEN the user’s favorite team or All-Star game is playing
steps.result:
THEN the user is presented the track button for live activities beginning 4.5 hours before game start time
AND the track button is defaulted to disabled

updates.summary: Jewel - Display Track Button on Scoreboard for Favorite Team Game

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user is on the scoreboard
AND they have a favorite team set

steps.action: WHEN there is a favorite team game scheduled for the current date
steps.result: THEN the user is presented the track button for live activities for the favorite team game (will begin showing 4.5 hours before game start time)

updates.summary: Jewel - Display Track Button on Scoreboard for All Star Game

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user is on the scoreboard
AND they do or do not have a favorite team set

steps.action: WHEN the All-Star game is scheduled for the current date
steps.result: THEN the user is presented the track button for live activities for all star game (will begin showing 4.5 hours before game start time)

updates.summary: GDM - Jewel event live, no favorite team set

preconditions.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

steps.action:
WHEN the event is live
AND I do not have a favorite team set
steps.result:
THEN I should see live mode
AND I should see gameday mini or mlb.tv for the jewel event based on eligibility
AND I should see jewel event branding in gameday mini

updates.summary: GDM - Multiple Jewel events defined in layout mapping

steps.action: WHEN that there are multiple jewel events in a layout mapping
steps.result: THEN the other Jewel event test cases will apply but to all events

updates.summary: GDM - Jewel event live with favorite team participating

preconditions.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

steps.action:
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite is also live
AND my favorite team is playing in the jewel event
steps.result:
THEN I should see live mode
AND I should see gameday mini or mlb.tv for my favorite team based on eligibility
AND I should see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

updates.summary: GDM - Jewel event and favorite team game live

preconditions.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

steps.action:
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite is also live
AND My favorite team is not playing in the jewel event
steps.result:
THEN I should see live mode AND I should see gameday mini or mlb.tv for my favorite team based on eligibility
AND I should not see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

updates.summary: GDM - Jewel Event live, favorite team game not live

preconditions.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

steps.action:
WHEN the event is live
AND my favorite team is not live
steps.result:
THEN I should see live mode
AND I should get gameday mini for that event based on eligibility
AND I should see any jewel event branding in gameday mini

updates.summary: GDM - Jewel Event and Favorite team game not live

preconditions.definition: GIVEN that I have added a jewel event to a layout mapping

steps.action:
WHEN the event is not live
AND my favorite team is not live
steps.result: THEN I should not see live mode

updates.summary: Swap Timestamp with Author

preconditions.definition: GIVEN the user is on the home tab

steps.action:
WHEN a ContentCarousel module is on the feed
AND there is a value configured in Contentful for replaceTimestampWithAuthorAfterDuration
steps.result: THEN the timestamp of an article in the carousel will be replaced with the author after the number of hours specified in the config

updates.summary: Display Carousel Content with Timestamp

preconditions.definition: GIVEN the user is on the home tab

steps.action: WHEN a ContentCarousel module is on the feed
steps.result: THEN the timestamp for when the piece of article or video content being displayed was published will be visible

preconditions.definition: GIVEN a TicketMerchandisingModule on a Surface

updates.summary: Previously logged in and completed auth flow

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN a user is logged into the app with their MLB.com uername
AND they have previously completed the MVPD auth flow

updates.summary: Previously purchased features are available once user enters the app

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has previously made an At Bat/MLB.TV purchase
AND the user initially launched the app

updates.summary: User is shown a toast identifying that a subscription has been detected and features are now restored

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has previously made an At Bat/MLB.TV purchase
AND the user initially launched the app

updates.summary: User who has previously made a purchase is NOT shown the paywall after auto linking occurs after initial launch

preconditions.definition: GIVEN the user has previously made an At Bat/MLB.TV purchase

updates.summary: Purchase is linked if user has made a purchase in Device A and launched app initially in device B

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has previously made in app purchases in device A
AND the user has initially launches the app on device B

updates.summary: Purchase is linked if user has made a subscribe and install purchase directly from Google Play

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has previously made the subscribe and install purchase directly from Google Play Store
AND the user has initially launches the app

updates.summary: Purchase is not restored if user has not made any previous purchase

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has NOT previously made in app purchases
AND the user has initially launches the app

updates.summary: Purchase is restored automatically upon initial launch of app if google account has previous purchase

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN the user has previously made in app purchases
AND the user has initially launches the app

updates.summary: App searches for Purchase upon initial launch of the app

preconditions.definition: GIVEN the user has initially launched the app

updates.summary: PiP for entitled user

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN MLB app installed on device
AND user is logged in the app
AND user is on Watch tab
AND user is entitled user

updates.summary: No feeds Error message

preconditions.definition: GIVEN an entitled user

updates.summary: Block media source

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND the media source (ie tv-fast.mlb.com/* AND/OR tv-gmc.mlb.com/*) is blocked (to simulate a failure)

updates.summary: Block media-gateway

preconditions.definition:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND the media-gateway endpoint is blocked (to simulate a failure)
